# vertexDescriptor

**Instance Property**

A Model I/O vertex descriptor specifying the data layout in the vertex buffers.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexDescriptor: MDLVertexDescriptor { get }
```

## Discussion

This is a convenience property. The [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKMesh] class does not use this descriptor, but your application may use this object to determine rendering state or create a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexDescriptor] object to build a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineState] object capable of interpreting the data in [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKMesh/vertexBuffers].

## Vertex Properties

- **vertexBuffers**: An array of buffers in which mesh vertex data resides.
- **vertexCount**: The number of vertices in the vertex buffers.
